remarks: The topology of the symmetric group on ` A ` .  This component is defined on a larger set than the true base - the product topology is defined on the set of all functions, not just bijections - but the definition of ` TopOpen ` ensures that it is trimmed down before it gets use.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Aug-2015.)
statement:
symggrp.1 $e |- G = ( SymGrp ` A ) $.
symgtset $p |- ( A e. V -> ( Xt_ ` ( A X. { ~P A } ) ) = ( TopSet ` G ) ) $.
